overview:
Kevin Millien is Chief Operating Officer of Boston Technologies. He is responsible for the company’s worldwide operations, including end-to-end management of sales activities, service, and support in all markets and countries. Kevin plays a key role in establishing goals, implementing objectives, and strategically branding the company as it continues to grow both domestically and internationally.

Prior to joining Boston Technologies, Kevin was the Vice President of Institutional Sales at FXCM. Here he focused on business development and client services specifically targeted to institutional investors. His managerial expertise along with consistent, integrated client-orientation led Kevin to hold both sales and leadership positions. This diverse skill set and organic industry expertise drove the firm’s growth over 600% in margin trading accounts and over $3 trillion in annual trading volume.

Kevin began his career in financial services with Morgan Stanley’s Fixed Income Division in New York City. He is currently based out of Boston Technologies global headquarters.
